:::Scourge/Hun-Grr/Ramjet:::

::He follows Megatron::
~~~~~
Hun-Grr: Blot? Hun-Grr not know.
::Opens his comm to Blot::
Hun-Grr: Blot, where you?  Come here now.
~~~~~
Ramjet: I would like a full alliance, in which we help each other whenever 
need be.  We need this Alliance because we are the last of the Destrons.  The 
eight of us are all that is left.  Alone we will not be able to thrive as a 
faction, so we need alignments.  We chose your group because you are a large 
and powerful faction, and i know of how you grew from a small group of 
breakaway predacons to the great power you are now.  This has inspired me. If 
i want someone helping me and my team out on the battlefield, id like someone 
reliable like yourselves.

--part1_ce.127bb28f.27eed3fc_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
